name: A Game About Brooklyn - 1.0 Prototype
description:
Controls: 

Left and Right arrow keys: Swap between sections of a sentence

Up and Down Arrow Keys: Change the language of your selected sentence chunk (highlighted in yellow)

Enter key: finalize and submit your sentence

*DEV NOTES*

There are still a number of bugs I am trying to squash in order to get the mechanic fully working, but this prototype allows for a rough idea of what I am trying to accomplish: Depending on how you speak to the NPC, they'll respond differently. Each NPC will have a preferred, disliked, and neutral language type that will correspond to the player's choices in language.
